1123.content:
I wake up and foundmyself in an big, brighty and red wall painted stable. Despite of his size, the stable looks pretty dirty and the smell start to affect your lungs as you instantly get surrounded by the stink of horse's manure. I hate the shit smell and being deeply "immersed" in this stinkness made my head lighter.

The stable s divided in 6 individuals stall, but they are all empty

Except for one that also has the door open.

Inside of it I see an great grey Shire with a fluffy white mare and tailhole, it looks amazing maybe a bit dirty... From my position you could see just the big and muscular rear of this incredible war horse and start to admire the powerness that it irridiates.

But suddenly I am shacked off from my thoughts, as I heard footsteps and the sound of a tinkling chainmail coming toward my direction.

" Where I am ? I have to hide myself and understand how get out of here ?"

There s not way and reason to go inside the shire's stall and around me there are just manure and a small hay pile

"Shit..." Footsteps are coming closer and closer...

15.title: other

info.brief_description: you put an advert to be forced to smell farts (roleplay)
info.description:
hello, following a discussion with someone who gave me an idea i started all over and changed a bit.
this interactive story is a ROLEPLAY
you must therefore give the description of a person who sniffed (a reader or me) then another reader create the person who fart. but respecting some rule.

rules

- no women.

- no death.

- no end.

- all is possible, so you could meet animated, superhero (be careful to respect the superhero, for example superman can not sweat as all the series says, but as he does not speak of his fart then you could choose whether normal fart or loose atomic fart etc, the superheroes will be cruel to you), animals (male), anthro (male), giant, etc.

- possible to play with the size (they can shrink you).

- respect the previous chapter

- allow all fetishes (armpit, other odor, feet, etc.) but keep some fart

the roleplay can be played solo, only if you create the two characters (macro + giant).

for free members: as you are limited in creation I suggest that you write me an email with the chapter link and the chapter you wanted to add, so I write it for you (I put your nickname at beginning). I am an Upgraded member.
